name: Health Secure Basic
description: Covers hospitalization up to ₹5L, free annual health checkups.

name: Health Secure Plus
description: Higher coverage with maternity benefits and critical illness.

name: Family Floater Plan
description: Covers all family members under a single premium.

name: Senior Citizen Care
description: Special plan for individuals aged 60 and above with domiciliary care.

name: Critical Illness Shield
description: Provides lump-sum coverage for major illnesses like cancer or heart surgery.
